scripts.ecr-registry:deploy: cdk deploy --app "mvn -e -q clean compile exec:java -Dexec.mainClass=net.giuliopulina.stratospheric.cdk.EcrRepositoryApp" --require-approval never
scripts.ecr-registry:destroy: cdk destroy --app "mvn -e -q clean compile exec:java -Dexec.mainClass=net.giuliopulina.stratospheric.cdk.EcrRepositoryApp" --force --require-approval never
scripts.app:synth: cdk synth --app "mvn -e -q clean compile exec:java -Dexec.mainClass=net.giuliopulina.stratospheric.cdk.MainApp" --require-approval never
scripts.app:deploy: cdk deploy --app "mvn -e -q clean compile exec:java -Dexec.mainClass=net.giuliopulina.stratospheric.cdk.MainApp" --require-approval never
scripts.app:destroy: cdk destroy --app "mvn -e -q clean compile exec:java -Dexec.mainClass=net.giuliopulina.stratospheric.cdk.MainApp" --force --require-approval never
